sentences.english: China has many water towns, especially in the Yangtze river delta area.
sentences.chinese: 中國的水城水鄉多，尤其是在長三角這個地區。

sentences.english: A citizen in Watertown told police someone was hiding in his boat.
sentences.chinese: 一位水城公民告訴警察有人躲在他的船裏。

sentences.english: Watertown is a place for the family to take a vacation.
sentences.chinese: 水城是一個家庭度假的好地方。

sentences.english: I was older, so was Venice.
And Joab fought against Rabbath of the children of Ammon, and laid close siege to the royal city.
sentences.chinese: 那時，約阿布正攻打阿孟子民的辣巴，佔據了水城。

sentences.english: Shuicheng County is one of the most serious karst collapse regions.
sentences.chinese: 水城是貴州最嚴重的岩溶塌陷區之一。

sentences.english: I came home from Stillwater today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天從靜水城回來到我父母的家。

sentences.english: Water logging is still very serious, low-lying neighborhoods change into Water City.
sentences.chinese: 內澇依然很嚴重，低窪街區變水城。

sentences.english: It is below the offensive with my powerful army, xu water city is very fast by breach.
sentences.chinese: 在我軍強大的攻勢下，徐水城很快就被攻破。

sentences.english: And Joab sent messengers to David, and said, I have fought against Rabbah, and have taken the city of waters.
sentences.chinese: 約押打發使者去見大衛，說，我攻打拉巴，取其水城。

sentences.english: Watertown is a great place for① the family to take a vacation.
sentences.chinese: 水城是適合於全家人度假的好地方。

sentences.english: The total sulphur content of the Liuzhi coal is higher than that of the Shuicheng coal.
sentences.chinese: 六枝煤田的全硫含量明顯高於水城煤田。

sentences.english: Elegant and Graceful, here is the famous Silk City alone.
sentences.chinese: 鍾靈毓秀，這裏是聞名遐邇的獨秀水城。
